title.narrative: OUTP 5.2: QUALITY Early Child Development (ECD), PRIMARY & SEC EDUC

description.narrative: Output 5.2: Increased national capacity to provide access to quality early learning opportunities, primary and secondary education., which contributes to Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 5: Improved and more equitable access to and completion of quality, inclusive education with improved learning outcomes.

sector.narrative: Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
Provision of parental education for school readiness (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision or procurement of primary education learning materials
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary standards and governance
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
System strengthening - mother tongue / multilingual education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
